channel.title: [PI] Barrows NPCs
channel.description: The melee NPCs in barrows are glitched. When you click on the sarcophagus and spawn Dharok, Verac, or Guthans, they just stand there and don't move. When you do attack them and just move away, they won't follow you. Like they're stuck on something.

item.title: [PI] Barrows NPCs
item.dc:creator: @DerpaDerpy DerpaDerpy
item.description:
@DerpaDerpy wrote:

[quote=“M0R3TANK1NG, post:3, topic:513687”]Go to NPCHandler.java, and find:

public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed(int Npc) {

Under that add new case’s for your agressive NPC’s

case = NPCID[/quote]
They’re already aggressive, they just don’t move like there is something in-front of them

Read full topic

Under that add new case’s for your agressive NPC’s

item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

You have to make them aggressive NPC’s I believe.

@DerpaDerpy wrote:

The melee NPCs in barrows are glitched. When you click on the sarcophagus and spawn Dharok, Verac, or Guthans, they just stand there and don’t move. When you do attack them and just move away, they won’t follow you. Like they’re stuck on something.
